Class Barrel

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Barrel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBarrel, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class Barrel extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IBarrel, Runnable
The Barrel Class implements the interface IBarrel It is responsible for storing all the information, such as, the inverted index, the linked pages and the top 10 searches It also listens for multicast messages from the Gateway and updates the information accordingly
See Also:
